document.title: WEL_CHECK_BOX_3_STATE
document.paragraph:
../../reference/controls/wel_check_box_3_state_chart.xml A WEL_CHECK_BOX_3_STATE control can take three states, checked, indeterminate or unchecked.
2Appearance A ../../reference/controls/wel_check_box_3_state_chart.xmlWEL_CHECK_BOX_3_STATE
images/wel_check_box_3_state_unchecked.png wel_check_box_3_state_unchecked
A checked ../../reference/controls/wel_check_box_3_state_chart.xmlWEL_CHECK_BOX_3_STATE
images/wel_check_box_3_state_checked.png wel_check_box_3_state_checked
A indeterminate ../../reference/controls/wel_check_box_3_state_chart.xmlWEL_CHECK_BOX_3_STATE
images/wel_check_box_3_state_indeterminate.png wel_check_box_3_state_indeterminate
